prompt: Can you recommend live video translator apps for Mac?

hidden_queries: live video translator apps for Mac
Mac apps that translate live video or translate spoken language in video conversation Mac live translation
metadata.generated_search_query: live video translator apps for Mac

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are live video or real-time translation tools you can use on a Mac — focusing on actual apps or features that work reasonably well rather than vague web services: Native / Built-in (no extra app) • Apple Live Translation (FaceTime, Messages, Calls) macOS now includes real-time translation for spoken audio in FaceTime and calls if your Mac supports Apple Intelligence features — works automatically in conversations. Apple Support

Mac Apps for Live Translation • Transcrybe – Live Translation Menu-bar app that listens to any audio on your Mac (Zoom, videos, calls) and shows subtitles/translation live. Works on-device for speed and privacy. App Store

sources.title: Live Caption-Screen Translate - App Store
sources.snippet: Download Live Caption-Screen Translate by XIAOYUN.TECH on the App Store. See screenshots, ratings and reviews, user tips, and more games like Live Caption-…

citation_mappings.claim_text: • Live Caption-Screen Translate (Mac version) Provides live captions/translation for screen content; can overlay translated text during videos or live streams. App Store
• ViewLingo (utility) Not a full translator app but overlays live text translation on anything on your screen, including videos. puritysb.github.io

sources.title: Real-time video translation | Microsoft Edge
sources.snippet: Enjoy real time video translation with ease and convenience The first time you translate a video to a new language, you'll be prompted to give your consent for a one-time language install. With your approval, Edge will install the translation model for that language directly on your device, ensuring all processing happens locally.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Browser / Cross-Platform Options These are not Mac apps per se but work on macOS and provide live translation: • Microsoft Edge – Real-time video translation Edge browser can translate audio/video content in real time for supported sites (e.g., YouTube). Microsoft

sources.title: The Top 6 Video Translation Software for Mac in 2026
sources.snippet: Here’s a list of the best Video Translation software for Mac. Use the tool below to explore and compare the leading Video Translation software for Mac. Filter the results based on user ratings, pricing, features, platform, region, support, and other criteria to find the best option for you.

citation_mappings.claim_text: • Google Translate Web (with live/voice translate) Not an app, but conversation or speech translation modes in the browser can serve similar purposes. Notes — Limitations & Expectations Most standalone “Mac apps” for live video translation are niche utilities (captions or overlay translators); full AI film-style re-dubbing or fluent live speech translation is usually done with browser/cloud tools or specialized services, not classic Mac software. Top Business Software
